text:
is “an amenity” he love.
So I’m working my ass off, trying to make you happy, updating you as I go and making it clear what’s happening, and now I’m some dick taking the
proper Moyer family’s stuff.
I could not have been more clear ahead of time, it is documented in OFW and agreed to, and none of it happened. It’s unfucking cool to make me a
dick on all those counts trying to please you.
Message 340 of 4024
Confirming you will pick up Adrian from school today at 1:15pm and drop off at 8:30pm
I discussed with Adrian regarding school options for sixth grade. He is comfortable with us exploring SAAS as an option especially if he does not need
to go through the application process again as he was previously admitted. If we go for seventh grade he will need to do that again and will be part of
late application process/waitlist.
Sent:01/10/2024 at 07:50 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/10/2024 at 10:09 AM)
Subject:Adrian
Message 341 of 4024
Reminder coding is at 3:30. His laptop is at the Kirkland house. I can put it outside front door for pick up.
Dylan will be picked up by Christina.
Sent:01/10/2024 at 11:39 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/10/2024 at 11:40 AM)
Subject:Re: Adrian
Message 342 of 4024
I need my computer in the guest room. If you would like I can take additional things as well. But I need that at a minimum now. I’ll be over before
lunch as I need to do some things by then. Please let me know an appropriate window that works for you. Thanks!
Sent:01/11/2024 at 10:30 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/11/2024 at 10:39 AM)
Subject:My Computer
Message 343 of 4024
Do not come to the Kirkland house. I do not give you permission.
Wait for further communication from your lawyer.
Sent:01/11/2024 at 10:40 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/11/2024 at 10:41 AM)
Subject:Re: My Computer
